column1: #Text=Asami says : " Do I have to be chained to the floor the whole way ?
#Text=" Asami says : " Ca n't you just chain me to that railing ?
#Text=I mean , where am I gon na go ?
#Text=" Arik says : " Well , as long as you 're chained up , I guess it does n't make a difference .
#Text=" Korra says : " Can I have ... some water ?
#Text=We 're also not going to bring you any rocks or fire , so do n't ask .
#Text=I guess there 's air , but there 's nothing we can do about that .
#Text=We 're not opening your compartment 'til we reach Ba Sing Se .
#Text=" Korra says : " I hoped Mako or Bolin would have shown up to save us by now .
